Rio De Janeiro

Rio de Janeiro is one of Brazil’s most iconic cities, famous for its stunning beaches, lively culture, and breathtaking natural scenery. From the towering Christ the Redeemer statue to the rhythm of samba, the city is full of energy and beauty. Located in the city’s West Zone, Barra da Tijuca is known for its long sandy beaches, modern lifestyle, and relaxed atmosphere. It’s a place where nature and urban life blend perfectly, making it a favorite destination for locals and tourists alike.

DeChinelo Kiosk History

We’re Bruno and Thamara — partners in life and in this little kiosk. The idea sparkled on a sunny afternoon walk when we couldn’t stop dreaming about sharing good food and warm smiles. We opened the kiosk to bring simple, fresh treats to our neighborhood with a relaxed, beachy vibe. From day one we focused on friendly service, honest prices, and recipes made with care. Every item is served like we’d serve our own family — attentively and with a smile. Today we keep improving, listening to customers, and making every visit a small, joyful break.
